home desc.one:
You are at home. Itâ€™s safe here. No monsters. Warm blankets.
There are other places if you want to do something more exciting.
Ruin somethingâ€™s day by going to the forest to hunt it - press F
Go to the shop to buy, sell or upgrade items - press S

home desc without pylon.one:
You don't have pylon within account.
To buy characters, you need to purchase pylons or sell existing characters/items on market to get pylons.

home desc without character.one:
You don't have any character yet.
You can buy one from market or at the shop

forest desc.one:
Oh! Here are the dark and spooky woods.
Somehow everything lives here at the same time. Donâ€™t think about it. Just choose something to pick a fight with.

shop desc.one:
Itâ€™s a blacksmithâ€™s store.
The blacksmith sells things, buys things, and mends things.
Sometimes he regrets his choices in life.

pylons central desc.one: Turn Pylons into useful things. Like pretend gold. Yes! This is a good use of your valuable Pylons.

develop desc.one: You are now testing things for development. Please enter commands you want to try

select buy character desc.one: Summon a hero. We got a whole lot of chosen ones back here.

select buy item desc.one: Swords are big and clever. Big. And. Clever.

select sell item desc.one: Sell some stuff. Make money, get britches. Weâ€™re pretty sure thatâ€™s how it works.

help about.one:
Legend of Undead Dragon v0.1.0
This is an old-school prototype game built to run on the pylons ecosystem.

help what you can do.one:
The purpose of this game is to defeat the Undead Dragon.
As you progress, you will fight enemies, buy swords from the blacksmith, and trade swords that you found in your adventures.
You need to have at least one character to play the game and you will also need gold to buy swords. Swords are good. You need swords to fight most monsters. You can get better swords too. Those are pretty awesome. Sometimes you will taste the bitter ashes of defeat, other times you will feel the euphoria of victory. This game is a real emotional rollercoaster.
You need swords to fight some monsters, during the game you will experience chilly dying and hot winner emotion.

help navigation.one:
There are 8 menus that you will use to navigate around the game.
You can go to Home, Forest, Shop, Pylons Central, Settings, Help page or Escape from the game using the navigation menu.

help page layout.one:
Each page has 5 sections.
- Navigation menu at the top
- Inventory on right
- Commands you can run under menu on left side.
- Situation box at the center left side.
- Input box at the bottom left of the page
- You can see all of your options for any menu at the top of the page.
- It provides an action list showing you what choices are available and what the hotkeys to select them are.

help game rules.one:
Don't use offensive or sexually explicit nicknames.
Don't automate trading orders with a bot.

help how it works.one:
This game works on a blockchain statemachine.
The game state changes when the transaction that contains your command, is confirmed and that command is run on all nodes that are running all over the world.
This game engine is a white box and you can experience a real blockchain game world while playing LOUD.

help upcoming releases.one:
We are excited to hear your feedback on the v0.1.0 release and we will use your suggestions to make decisions on how to go forward.
We already have tons of features implemented in the core daemon, so if you ask for something, we can make changes according to that.
You will be able to build your own game by forking our project, as this is a prototype game.

help Support.one: Contact loud@pylons.tech for anything about LOUD game.
